titleStmt.title: A Purge for pluralities shewing the unlawfulnesse of men to have two livings, or, The downe-fall of double benefices being in the clymactericall and fatall yeare of the proud prelates : but the yeare of iubilee to all poore hunger-pinch'd schollers.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Cowles, T. Bates, and T. Banks,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
